result.html: An bhfuil an seomra saorIs the room free?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil an seomra saorIs the room free?

result.eng: We has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ga: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.orig: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.html: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orainn codlaḋ in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.

result.eng: There was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ga: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.orig: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.html: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seomra beag in uaċtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.

result.html: Rith sé isteach sa seomraHe ran into the room.
result.ponchtml: Riṫ sé isteaċ sa seomraHe ran into the room.

result.eng: Come to me across the room.
result.html: Tar chugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.
result.ponchtml: Tar ċugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.

result.eng: The room is full of smoke.
result.ga: Tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.orig: Tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.html: Tá an seomra lán de dheatachThe room is full of smoke.
result.ponchtml: Tá an seomra lán de ḋeataċThe room is full of smoke.

result.html: Tá seomra in áirithe againnWe have booked a room.
result.ponchtml: Tá seomra in áiriṫe againnWe have booked a room.

result.html: Uimhir do sheomraYour room number?
result.ponchtml: Uiṁir do ẛeomraYour room number?

result.eng: There are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
result.ga: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite ann
result.orig: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite ann
result.html: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite annThere are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
result.ponchtml: Tá trí ẛeomra codlata cisteanaċ agus seomra suite annThere are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.

result.eng: I like the hall and the sitting room.
result.ga: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suite
result.orig: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suite
result.html: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suiteI like the hall and the sitting room.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom an halla agus an seomra suiteI like the hall and the sitting room.

result.eng: There are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
result.ga: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór
result.orig: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór

result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ẛeomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-ṁórThere are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.

result.eng: The kitchen and sitting room are one room.
result.ga: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháin
result.orig: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháin
result.html: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháinThe kitchen and sitting room are one room.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċistin agus seomra suite mar ẛeomra aṁáinThe kitchen and sitting room are one room.

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ga: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach

result.eng: Up I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
